SQL: SELECT oth.UUID, oth.OUTHOUSE_NUMBER, oth.OUTHOUSE_PERSON, oth.OUTHOUSE_DATE, oth.RECEIVER, oth.REQUISITION, oth.ACCESSORY, oth.REMARK, oth.APPROVAL_STATUS FROM REP_SUBSTANCE_OUTHOUSE oth LEFT JOIN T_S_BASE_USER tsbu ON oth.CREATE_BY = TSBU.USERNAME LEFT JOIN T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub ON tsbu.ID = tsrub.userid where oth.APPROVAL_STATUS='1' and tsrub.orgid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ID FROM T_S_DEPART START WITH ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT orgid FROM T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE WHERE userid = :uuid ) CONNECT BY parentdepartid = PRIOR ID ) AND (oth.ISDELETED IS NULL OR oth.ISDELETED = 0) ORDER BY oth.CREATE_DATE DESC
